is a small and beautiful village in Kannur District, Kerala State, in

. It is about 10 kilometres away from Thaliparamba. The Valapattanam River flows through the village. A traditional art of Malabar "Theyyam" can be seen here on some months in various temples. There is a small upper primary school called Kurumathur South U.P School here. There is a big and old Brahmin house known as Kurumathur Illom here.

Kurumathur Illom : A big and old Brahmin house.
Akathoot Temple : A small temple.
Kurumthur South UP School : A small school.
